title: User can view create new button on player history
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the team roster
custom_steps:
WHEN selecting a player
AND navigating to the Player History widget
custom_expected: THEN there will be a “Create New” button visible in the lower right hand corner of the Player History widget.

title: User can view the player history widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in an on the roster widget
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on a player from the roster widget
custom_expected: THEN the player’s Player History widget will be visible

title: User submitting a release to BOC should post the tx in their player history
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a release for a player
custom_steps: WHEN submitting to the BOC
custom_expected:
THEN the transaction will appear in the Player History
AND the Code = RELES, Description = Release of Minor League Player
AND will be in green font

title: User can view existing release transaction
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is an existing release tx
custom_steps: WHEN a user clicks on the existing tx in the player’s Player History
custom_expected: THEN the tx will open in the same window

title: User can save a release tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an existing release tx
AND in edit mode
AND changes have been made
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Save”
custom_expected:
THEN the status will be set to “Preliminary”
AND all current values will be saved
AND a blue notification will display

title: User can create new release from from player history
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a player’s Player History
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Release of a Minor League Player” under the “Create New” button
custom_expected: THEN a new Preliminary Release for the player will open in edit mode

title: User can close a release
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in an existing release in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Close”
custom_expected: THEN the user will return to their entry point into the transaction

title: Club should receive notification when their release is approved/rejected/reversed
custom_preconds: GIVEN a transfer has been moved to approved, rejected, or reversed
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the notifications widget
custom_expected:
THEN the initiating club will receive a notification when the tx is updated
AND the “Description” will be a hyper link

title: Submitting a release to BOC should update players pending ORG/Club and roster status
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player is being released
custom_steps: WHEN submitting the release to the BOC
custom_expected:
THEN the system will set the player’s pending org and club to null
AND the system will set the player’s pending minor league roster status to “Released”
AND the system will set the player’s pending major league roster status to null

title: User can cancel creation or changes to a release
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a release in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Cancel”
custom_expected:
THEN a prompt will appear asking the user to confirm
AND once confirmed the release will not be saved
AND the form will close to the entry point of the tx

title: User is alerted if release date is not within 3 days of current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a release is created
custom_steps: WHEN entering a release date 3 business days before or after the current date
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "Assignment date should be within 3 business days of submission.", "Please use the Comments field to explain the reason for the delay."

title: User is alerted if release date precedes certain txs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the release date is before the player’s most recent Approved, Pending “to club” or Submitted tx
AND is not a waiver, re-affiliation, or tender tx
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit”, “Approve”, or “Save”
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "A transaction cannot be scheduled before the date of <Roster Name, Last Name>'s latest approved or pending transaction, on <TX Date>"

title: User is alerted when release date is btwn reserve list and rule 5 system dates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the player is under control
AND has an active minor league contract covering the current year
AND the release date is not between the MJ and MN league reserve list and the Rule 5 draft
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit”, “Approve”, or “Save and Run Rule Checks”
custom_expected: THEN an error message will appear "A player on a Minor League under control list cannot be released between the Reserve filing period and the end of the Rule 5 draft."

title: Release - General
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN on a release transaction
custom_expected: THEN the user can create, view, and edit the transaction

title: Release - BOC MN Admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a BOC Approver
custom_steps: WHEN on a release transaction
custom_expected:
THEN user can view and print the transaction in all states
AND can view all flags for the transaction
AND can create, delete, edit, e-sign, submit, approve, reject, reverse, and suppress

title: User should receieve error when player being released is a MJ player
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player’s pending roster status is at the major league level
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit” or “Approve”
custom_expected: THEN an error will appear "This is a Minor League transaction but the player is playing at the Major League."

title: User should be directed to an existing tx if they attempt to create new release who has pending tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an existing release tx in Preliminary, Submitted, or Rejected state
AND was created within 10 days of the current date
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Release of a Minor League Player” from the Create New
custom_expected: THEN the existing release will load in view mode instead of opening a new release tx

title: As a user I want holidays recorded in the system
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is working with DEV
custom_steps: WHEN checking the database table for stored holidays
custom_expected:
THEN the date will be in mm/dd/yy format
AND have a description with no more than 60 alphanumeric characters

title: User cannot initiate tx for player who does not belong to their club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club user
AND on a roster for another org/club
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Release of a Minor League Player”
custom_expected: THEN blocking message appears "You do not have permission to create a transaction for a player that belongs to another Organization.", “If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC."

title: User should be alerted if they are releasing a first year domestic too soon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player is a first-year domestic player
AND have not been on the roster for 15 or more days during the season
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit”, “Approve”, or “Save and Run Rule Check”
custom_expected: THEN the warning will appear “You may not release a first-year Minor league player who was signed for the current season until he has been under control during the season for 15 days."

title: User can submit release to BOC for approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a club user
custom_steps:
WHEN creating a preliminary release
AND selecting “Submit”
custom_expected: THEN the status of the transaction will move to “Submitted to BOC”

title: User is prevented from initiating release for player that does not have valid MNC
custom_preconds: GIVEN the player does not have a MNC in one of the designated states: Terms Submitted, Terms Accepted, Update Terms Accepted, Pre-approved, Approved
custom_steps: WHEN selecting “Release of a Minor League Player”
custom_expected: THEN error will appear "This transaction may only be performed on a player with an active Minor League Contract."

title: User should see an intent to release checkbox if conditions are met
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player is currently a minor league player
AND has a current major league contract
AND release date is greater or equal to major league tender date
AND less or equal to the first day of major league season date
custom_steps: WHEN creating a new release for the player
custom_expected: THEN the intent to release checkbox will appear for the release of a minor league player tx

title: User is alerted if they have not checked intent to release box
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the intent to release checkbox is available
AND is left unchecked
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Submit”, “Approve”, or “Save and Run Rule Checks”
custom_expected: THEN an error message appears "Player must be given an “Intent to release” form 2 days before the date of release if the release date is between the Tender Date and Opening Day."

title: BOC can open player profile associated with submitted release from Approvals
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN there is a submitted release on the approvals clipboard
custom_expected: THEN user can click on hyper link of players name to navigate to player’s Player History profile

title: BOC approving a release terminates the players MJC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND there is a release for a minor league player
custom_steps: WHEN approving the release tx
custom_expected:
THEN the player’s current major contract status updates to “Terminated”
AND Contract status on contract will say “Terminated”

title: BOC can open the submitted release from approvals
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a release on the approvals clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on the hyperlink of a submitted release tx
custom_expected: THEN it will open the submitted release tx in view mode in the same window/tab

title: BOC can reverse and unterminate MJC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is an existing release transaction
AND its status is “Approved”
AND there is a contract marked as terminated
custom_steps: WHEN reversing the tx
custom_expected: THEN the terminated contract will be unterminated

title: BOC can suppress a reversed release tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a release status is in a reversed state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Suppress”
custom_expected: THEN the tx will be hidden from the player’s Player History, searches, and any other place where it is visible on the UI.

title: BOC can reverse a release tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a release in an approved state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking on “Reverse”
custom_expected:
THEN a revers notification will be displayed
AND the transaction status will be updated to “Reversed”
AND the release will be undone

title: BOC can reject the release
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND a release is in the “Submitted to BOC” state
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Reject”
custom_expected:
THEN the status will be moved to “Rejected”
AND any approval item on the approvals clipboard is removed
AND player’s pending org and club is reversed
AND player’s pending MJR and MNR statuses are reversed
AND the entry is removed from the player history

title: BOC receieves an approval item when release is submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN a release status is in “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps:
WHEN logged in as a BOC approver
AND on the Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an approvals item available for the release pending approval
AND any attachments, comments, or flags will be displayed

title: BOC approving a release tx updates player information
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a release is in a state “Submitted to BOC”
AND user is a BOC approver
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN the player’s org and club will be set to ‘null’
AND the logo on player’s profile reverts to MLB lobo
AND sets player’s ever been released flag 1 (true)

title: BOC can approve release tx
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC approver
AND a release tx is in a status of “Submitted to BOC”
custom_steps: WHEN clicking “Approve”
custom_expected:
THEN the status is updated to “Approved”
AND a blue notification will display
AND on the approval item on the approvals clipboard is removed
AND the player’s Player History: Code = RELES, Description = Release of Minor League Player to be in black font.
AND MJR status is set to ‘null’
AND MNR status is set to “Released”

title: BOC can see flags if rule checks fail
custom_preconds: GIVEN certain rule checks have failed for a release
custom_steps:
WHEN logged in as a BOC user
AND there is a release with flags displayed on the Approval Clipboard
AND clicking on the flag icon
custom_expected: THEN the icon opens a popover with the flags that are currently set for the form
